articles.author: Chris Pandolfo
articles.title: Bernie Sanders moves to reduce work hours for millions of Americans - Fox Business
articles.description: Sen. Bernie Sanders, I-Vt., has put forward a plan to create a four-day workweek in the U.S. that he claims won't reduce pay or benefits.
articles.content:
Vermont Sen. Bernie Sanders has unveiled a plan that would create a 32-hour workweek with no loss of pay.
The independent lawmaker, chairman of the Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and … [+4153 chars]
